arts.ttl: Lewis Holtby furious at officiating after disallowed goal: “If that’s a foul, then I better retire next year.”
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel captain Lewis Holtby didn't mince words when weighing in on the officiating controversies in Sunday's 2-2 draw with VfL Bochum.

arts.ttl: Honours even as Holstein Kiel and Bochum play out enthralling relegation battle
arts.sum: Boadu's persistence paid off in the 37th minute when he latched onto a pass from Matúš Bero and fired a low shot from inside the box into the net, bringing Bochum level. Steven Skrzybski and David Zec were on the scoresheet for the hosts in an action-packed encounter marked by early injuries, frantic attacking football, and late drama.

arts.ttl: Kiel and Bochum share points in relegation clash
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel fought back a one-goal deficit in the second half to gain a vital point in the relegation clash between themselves and VfL Bochum on Sunday in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs VfL Bochum preview: Relegation six-pointer looms
arts.sum: In a crucial clash at the bottom, Holstein Kiel host Bochum as both sides scrap for points on their quest for Bundesliga survival.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. VfL Bochum - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and VfL Bochum, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
